attributes.action: Ban the sale of and use of disposable nappies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 19 million disposable nappies are thrown into landfill each year in the UK. What a waste of landfill. The plastics and chemicals used in them also makes them virtually non-biodegradable and who knows how much methane (a far more powerful greenhouse gas than CO2) they release.
